at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.configuration

Class JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.configuration.JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder

  • public class JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder
extends Object
    Facade class that allows to build JCloudScaleConfiguration easier and more readable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder()
      Creates a new instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder with LocalCloudPlatformConfiguration.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder(CloudPlatformConfiguration cloudPlatform)
      Creates a new instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder with specified cloud platform configuration.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JCloudScaleConfiguration build()
      Provides access to the configuration that is being built.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder with(AbstractClassLoaderConfiguration classLoaderConfiguration)
      Allows specifying class loader configuration of the server.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder with(AbstractScalingPolicy scalingPolicy)
      Allows specifying scaling policy that defines how new cloud objects will be mapped to the cloud hosts.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder with(CloudPlatformConfiguration cloudPlatform)
      Allows specifying cloud platform configuration.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withCommunicationServerPublisher(boolean startPublisher)
      Allows specifying whether multicast publisher should be started within this application instance to allow discovering communication server (Message Queue Server) on non-default ports.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withInvocationTimeout(long timeoutInMsec)
      Allows to specify the invocation timeout for all requests from client to cloud hosts.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withLogging(Level level)
      Allows specifying the level of client-side and server-side logging.

      Allows specifying the level of client-side logging.

      Allows specifying logging level for custom logger named as the provided class.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withLoggingCustom(String loggerName, Level level)
      Allows specifying logging level for custom logger.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withLoggingServer(Level level)
      Allows specifying the level of server-side logging.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withMonitoring(boolean monitoringEnabled)
      Allows specifying whether monitoring features of the JCloudScale should be enabled or not.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withMonitoringEvents(Class<? extends Event>... eventClasses)
      Allows registering external monitoring events to be used within monitoring functionality of JCloudScale.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withMQServer(String hostname, int port)
      Allows specifying hostname and port of the Message Queue server.

      Allows specifying hostname of the Message Queue server
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withMQServerPort(int port)
      Allows specifying the port of the Message Queue server.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withMQStartServerAutomatically(boolean startServer)
      Allows specifying whether Message Queue server should be started automatically by the JCloudScale in case it is not running or not accessible.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withRedirectAllOutput(boolean redirect)
      Allows specify whether the output from the server (standard and error) should be redirected to the clients appropriate output or not.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withRedirectStdErrorOutput(boolean redirect)
      Allows specify whether the error output from the server should be redirected to the clients error output or not.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withRedirectStdOutput(boolean redirect)
      Allows specify whether the standard output from the server should be redirected to the clients standard output or not.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withScaleDownIntervalInSec(long scaleDownIntervalInSec)
      Allows specifying how often scaling down method of the scaling policy will be invoked for each host.
      JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withUI(boolean enabled)
      Allows specifying whether UI of JCloudScale is enabled or not (it can be accessed from code or from CmdClient extension)

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public JCloudScaleConfiguration build()
        Provides access to the configuration that is being built.
        Returns:
        The instance of the JCloudScaleConfiguration that is being built.

      • with

        public JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder with(AbstractScalingPolicy scalingPolicy)
        Allows specifying scaling policy that defines how new cloud objects will be mapped to the cloud hosts.
        Parameters:
        scalingPolicy - The scaling policy to be used in builded configuration.
        Returns:
        The current instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder to allow continuing configuration.

      • with

        Allows specifying class loader configuration of the server.
        Parameters:
        classLoaderConfiguration - The class loader configuration to be used on the cloud hosts.
        Returns:
        The current instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder to allow continuing configuration.

      • withMQStartServerAutomatically

        public JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withMQStartServerAutomatically(boolean startServer)
        Allows specifying whether Message Queue server should be started automatically by the JCloudScale in case it is not running or not accessible.
        Parameters:
        startServer - true if the server has to be started in case it is not available. Oterwise, false.
        Returns:
        The current instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder to allow continuing configuration.

        Returns:
        The current instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder to allow continuing configuration.

      • withCommunicationServerPublisher

        public JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withCommunicationServerPublisher(boolean startPublisher)
        Allows specifying whether multicast publisher should be started within this application instance to allow discovering communication server (Message Queue Server) on non-default ports.
        Parameters:
        startPublisher - true if the multicast publisher has to be started. Otherwise, false.
        Returns:
        The current instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder to allow continuing configuration.

        public JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withScaleDownIntervalInSec(long scaleDownIntervalInSec)
        Allows specifying how often scaling down method of the scaling policy will be invoked for each host.
        Parameters:
        scaleDownIntervalInSec - The positive long value that indicates the amount of seconds between scale down method invocations.
        Returns:
        The current instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder to allow continuing configuration.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • withUI

        public JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withUI(boolean enabled)
        Allows specifying whether UI of JCloudScale is enabled or not (it can be accessed from code or from CmdClient extension)
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if UI interface should be enabled and waiting for connections. Otherwise, false.
        Returns:
        The current instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder to allow continuing configuration.

      • withRedirectAllOutput

        public JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withRedirectAllOutput(boolean redirect)
        Allows specify whether the output from the server (standard and error) should be redirected to the clients appropriate output or not.
        Parameters:
        redirect - true if both, standard and error, outputs should be redirected to the client standard and error outputs appropriately. Otherwise, false.
        Returns:
        The current instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder to allow continuing configuration.

        The current instance of JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder to allow continuing configuration.

        public JCloudScaleConfigurationBuilder withInvocationTimeout(long timeoutInMsec)
        Allows to specify the invocation timeout for all requests from client to cloud hosts.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
